Pavel Rogala

Hi, I'm Pavel

I'm a self-taught, full-stack Web Developer

What I do at work.

I'm a lead developer on the Stereofund project, which also happens to be home for some of the most awesome people ever. I write about web development and run a company in Novi Sad, Serbia that provides an introductory course on front-end development. I also moonlight as a copywriter and consultant for The Media Cocktail.

What I do in my free time.

I live with my lovely and talented girlfriend and spend a lot of my free time running after our two dogs or "helping" with her arts and crafts project Turquoise Arrow. I also play guitar with a few other odd individuals in a band we call FYN. I enjoying reading Tom Clancy, watching terrible 80's action movies , watching my girlfriend get scared watching horror flicks, playing Call f Duty, or pitting our two dogs against each other in tug of war ... to the death (of boredom).
